settings.text: We offer reliable delivery across the UAE, with your furniture arriving within 2-4 weeks from the time of order. Every piece is brand new and transported directly from our warehouse to ensure the highest quality. Our dedicated delivery team will bring your sofa straight to your home, ensuring a smooth and hassle-free experience.

settings.heading: Place Your Order
settings.text: Find your favourite items and checkout using a variety of payment and finance options.

settings.heading: Await Confirmation
settings.text: You'll receieve confirmation of your order via email. We'll be in touch to arrange delivery.

settings.heading: Guarantee heading
settings.text: Share information about your products, policies or services.

settings.heading: The Day Of Delivery
settings.text: You'll receieve confirmation and our two-person team will deliver your items.

settings.heading: Enjoy Your New Furniture
settings.text: Sit back, relax and please don't forget to leave us a review on Trustpilot.

settings.heading: What if the items don't fit through my door?
settings.row_content: If we are unable to successfully deliver your items due to the size of your doorway, we will return the items to our Headquarters and offer a full refund with no hidden costs or charges.

settings.heading: How much does delivery cost?
settings.row_content: We believe in making your furniture shopping experience as seamless as possible—that’s why we offerfree delivery across the UAE. No hidden fees, no extra charges—just high-quality furniture delivered straight to your home at no additional cost. It’s our way of ensuring luxury and convenience go hand in hand.

settings.heading: When will my order be delivered?
settings.row_content: For in-stock items, we are usually able to deliver within 7 days. Some orders take a little longer depending on your location and the availability of gthe items you order.We deliver to different regions of the UK on different days of the week. Simply enter your postcode into our postcode checker below to see which days we deliver to your area.

settings.heading: Do you assemble my furniture?
settings.row_content: If you have ordered a sofa, our delivery team will assemble your sofa in any room of choice. This is included as part of our delivery service at no extra cost. There is no assembly included on flatpack furniture and other items.

settings.heading: Frequently Asked Delivery Questions
settings.top_subheading: A few questions we get about our delivery service.
